::: {.fragment fragment-index=5}
<p style="margin-top: -.5em;">There are two complementary approaches to handle this situation:</p>
:::

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%" .fragment fragment-index=6}
- **Signal processing**
  - Model-based
  - <span class="alr">Large bias</span>
  - <span class="alg">Low complexity</span>
:::

::: {.column width="50%" .fragment fragment-index=7}
- **AI / ML**
  - Data-based
  - [Low bias]{.alg}
  - [High complexity]{.alr}
:::

:::


::: {.info-box .fragment data-fragment-index=8}
**Hybrid approach <span class="alg"> $\rightarrow$ *model-based machine learning*</span>**

Use models to <span class="mplsteelblue">__*structure*__</span>, <span class="mplsteelblue">__*initialize*__</span> or <span class="mplsteelblue">__*optimize*__</span> learning methods
:::

::: {.incremental}
- Make models more flexible: reduce bias of signal processing methods
- Guide machine learning methods: reduce their complexity
:::
